abstract: Southern California Gas Company announces it is appealing court order that company continue to provide housing for families displaced by natural gas leak for another three weeks; company claims air quality in area, near Los Angeles, poses no further health risk.

headline.print_headline: California: Utility Balks at Paying for Housing
headline.main: California: Utility Balks at Paying for Housing

snippet: The Southern California Gas Company, responsible for a 16-week natural gas leak near Los Angeles, is appealing a court order to extend housing for displaced families.
lead_paragraph: The Southern California Gas Company, responsible for a 16-week natural gas leak near Los Angeles, is appealing a court order to extend housing for displaced families.
